items.sentence: Tom wants to know if you\'ll be ready by 2:30.
You\'re going to have to do that, aren\'t you?
You\'re hiding something from me, aren\'t you?
You\'re interested in doing that, aren\'t you?
Do you think Tom will be home on October 20th?
Tom tasted the soup and said it was delicious.
We all started hugging and kissing each other.
I spent over three thousand dollars yesterday.
Tom had a hard time making a living in Boston.
Tom had enough time to do what had to be done.
